text: /object if(user().getvar("HalEv") = 0)-=-Please speak to my granddaughter.-=-elseif(user().getvar("HalEv") = 3)-=-Would you like into the Catacombs?-=-$gcat=select("Yes, please.", "No thanks.")-=-if($gcat=1)-=-Step in, please.-=-user().move("Graveyard Catacomb F2", 12, 83)-=-elseif($gcat=2)-=-Alright. Goodbye.-=-endif()-=-elseif(user().getvar("HalEv") = 2)-=-if(user().getvar("ConT") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("GraD") = 1)-=-Good, good. You've proven your worth. Step in, please.-=-user().move("Graveyard Catacomb F2", 12, 83)-=-user().setvar("HalEv", 3)-=-elseif(user().getvar("HalEv") = 1)-=-Oh, did my granddaughter send you? Good, you must be strong.-=-I'm sure you noticed the people around here by now. They're being mind-controlled by the evil spirit, Darkrai.-=-Darkrai has plaugued people for many years, or so the legends say.-=-He recently moved into our Catacombs and started controlling people and pokemon everywhere.-=-Since then my granddaughter has been searching for tough trainers, like you. So, are you going to help us or not?-=-$helphim=select("I'll help you!", "Sounds like a waste of time.")-=-if($helphim=2)-=-I was going to give you a reward, but I changed my mind.-=-elseif($helphim=1)-=-I knew you would. To gain entrance, you must prove your worth by speaking to all 10 of the controlled people in the maze.-=-You must also speak to the 5 spirits from the gravestones scattered around it. Good luck!-=-user().setvar("HalEv", 2)-=-endif()-=-if(user().getvar("BT1") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT2") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT3") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT4") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT5") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT6") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT7") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT8") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT9") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BT10") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BG1") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BG2") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BG3") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BG4") = 1)-=-if(user().getvar("BG5") = 1)-=-user().setvar("GraD", 1)-=-user().setvar("ConT", 1)-=-user().setvar("BG1", 0)-=-user().setvar("BG2", 0)-=-user().setvar("BG3", 0)-=-user().setvar("BG4", 0)-=-user().setvar("BG5", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT1", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT2", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT3", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT4", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT5", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT6", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT7", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT8", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT9", 0)-=-user().setvar("BT10", 0)-=-else()-=-You haven't completed what I asked, yet.
